entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:25 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.1°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
